name: BodyStructure
title: BodyStructure
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Orders and Observations)
description: Record details about an anatomical structure. This resource may be used when a coded concept does not provide the necessary detail needed for the use case.

elements.name: BodyStructure
elements.description: Record details about an anatomical structure.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifier for this instance of the anatomical structure.

elements.name: active
elements.description: Whether this body site is in active use.

elements.name: morphology
elements.description: The kind of structure being represented by the body structure at location. This can define both normal and abnormal morphologies.

elements.name: location
elements.description: The anatomical location or region of the specimen, lesion, or body structure.

elements.name: locationQualifier
elements.description: Qualifier to refine the anatomical location.

elements.name: description
elements.description: A summary, characterization or explanation of the body structure.

elements.name: image
elements.description: Image or images used to identify a location.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The person to which the body site belongs.
